english: He had never quite admitted to himself .
chinese: 他对自己也不肯爽爽快快承认。

english: He was tripped into saying he was to blame .
chinese: 他不得不承认是他的过错。

english: He has the support and approval of the public .
chinese: 他有公众的支持和承认。

english: She admitted that her mother had spoilt her .
chinese: 她承认是妈妈把她惯坏了。

english: It's frivolous misuse of time, i confess .
chinese: 我承认，这有点无谓浪费时间。
承认造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: He admitted it without justifying it .
chinese: 他不加辩解地承认这个想法。

english: Mary assented quietly to this speech .
chinese: 玛丽默默地承认他说的有理。

english: Most people confess to have a bad memory .
chinese: 大多数人都承认记性差。
他们拒不承认对方提出的事。

english: We admit dunois is a great captain .
chinese: 我们承认杜诺瓦是一位大将。

english: I freely admit that i made a mistake .
chinese: 我欣然承认我犯了个错误。

english: The us government made no formal acknowledgement .
chinese: 美国政府没有正式承认。

english: It must be confessed that bertha exaggerated .
chinese: 必须承认，伯莎做得过份了。

english: I'll admit nancy got under my skin yesterday .
chinese: 我承认南希昨天惹得我气忿。

english: You must admit that's a miscarriage of goods .
chinese: 你必须承认那是货物的误投。
